raw_body: Beloved wife of Bobby (B.Ι.Α.) Perera ex Ceylon Tobacco, mother of Hirantha and Sriyantha, mother- in-law of Manori and Sumudi, grandmother of Jerome, Janine, Shiveka and Shanaya, expired.
